snippet.title: a Dragon's Re-Quest Trailer
snippet.description:
So, for the last year I have worked on this game project together with a friend, nicknamed St.Bomber. We are starting to close into the last parts of the last chapter. There are also some side content we want to make to maximize the experience, one of thees things was an animated intro I decided to do, both as a trail on myself as an artist, but also as I felt the game deserved it.

The music is by Cleyton Kauffman, it's called "Anime-esque Intro-Outro Theme" Check him out, he does cool stuff.

For you who thinks it looks interesting, we have a patron for the project and any eventual project we will do together in the future.:

https://www.patreon.com/Saintbomber

I wish to warn in that regard that the game will come in two versions, one child friendly while the second have some naughty bit's kissable, the child version is still under work.
